select a.id aid, a.supply_unit_code asupply_unit_code, a.supply_unit_name asupply_unit_name, a.no_tax_purchase_price ano_tax_purchase_price, a.tax_included_price atax_included_price, a.joint_franchise_rate ajoint_franchise_rate, a.point apoint, a.is_default ais_default, a.product_sku_code aproduct_sku_code, a.product_sku_name aproduct_sku_name, a.usage_status ausage_status, a.apply_code aapply_code, a.del_flag adel_flag, a.create_time acreate_time, a.create_by acreate_by, a.update_time aupdate_time, a.update_by aupdate_by, a.categories_supply_channels_code acategories_supply_channels_code, a.categories_supply_channels_name acategories_supply_channels_name, b.id bid, b.supply_unit_code bsupply_unit_code, b.supply_unit_name bsupply_unit_name, b.product_sku_code bproduct_sku_code, b.product_sku_name bproduct_sku_name, b.out_put bout_put, b.need_days bneed_days, b.apply_code bapply_code, b.del_flag bdel_flag, b.create_time bcreate_time, b.create_by bcreate_by, b.update_time bupdate_time, b.update_by bupdate_by from product_sku_supply_unit a left join product_sku_supply_unit_capacity b on a.product_sku_code = b.product_sku_code and a.supply_unit_code = b.supply_unit_code where a.product_sku_code = #{skuCode}
